Pre-Game Insights: The West Indies have emerged as a dark horse contender with a quality squad full of experienced cricketers, who bring a wealth of T20 experience.
Papua New Guinea will hope to register a few positive results in this World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Windies directly qualified for the World Cup as one of the hosts.
PNG went unbeaten in qualifying for the event, winning six matches on the bounce and defeating Japan, Vanuatu, and the Philippines in the regional final to qualify.
Others: The West Indies may be one of the best across the tournament with competent batting options till number 8.
But on the bowling front, West Indies could struggle as they need a world-class strike bowler and also because of the inexperience of their bowlers.
Amini could certainly be effective against the Windies with the spin-friendly conditions at the Providence Stadium in Guyana.
